column1: Economics, Finance and Data Analysis MSc
column5: Are you passionate about the dynamic fields of economics and finance and intrigued by the power of data analysis? The Master of Science (MSc) in Economics, Finance, and Data Analysis at Lancaster University is a cutting-edge programme designed to equip you with the knowledge, skills, and tools to thrive in the rapidly evolving world of financial analysis and decision-making.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
